name: Marry Maria: On Vacation
description:
This game was made for the Curdle Jam #16, i used the Raylib framework to make it.

You (Maria), Laila (the person Curdle chose as Maria's love interest), Matt (the smart guy) and Julian (the SHRIMP) go on a vacation to The QueensLand (England), but you don't realize that you are driving on the right side of the road! So you will have avoid a lot of cars and angry british people.

Oh, and your also trapped in a Commodore 64 for some reason. (I mean it's not that I just am lazy and don't want to draw good art or something)
